Name: Cinnamon Bread
Ingredients:
• 2 tsp ground cinnamon and 1/3 cup brown sugar for topping
• 2 cups of vegan flour
• 1/2 tsp salt
• 1 tbsp baking powder
• 1 brown sugar
• 1 mashed banana
• 1 cup oat milk
• 1/3 cup of coconut oil
Details:
Preheat oven to 350°f and grease a loaf pan.
In a bowl combine oat milk, mashed banana and melted coconut oil. Also add the baking powder, flour, brown sugar and salt into the bowl. Be sure to mix everything evenly.
In a bowl mix brown sugar and cinnamon spice for topping.
Pour batter into loaf pan and top with cinnamon/brown sugar topping.
Place loaf into oven for 40-50 minutes until toothpicks inserted into loaf come out clean without batter.
Take out and let loaf cool before cutting
Reheat and top with vegan butter.
Enjoy!
